item.title: 7 Tips On Making Your Engineering Workflow Faster
item.description: One of the most important thing that I like about pair programming with other awesome engineers is you get to see their workflows. How they get things done? How they get find and make their way around tools, terminal, and editors? After witnessing and getting awestruck by many such experiences I realized that having an effective workflow can increase your day to productivity many folds. The next step was to take action, and while doing so, I have compiled few tips to make your engineering flow faster too.
